course_title: Masterpieces of the Novella in Italian Literature

sections.comments: A study of the genre of the novella as an expression of social and political contexts within and across cultures from its inception in feudal times to the post-modern age. Full description: https://fhis.ubc.ca/course-description/itst333/

description: A study of the genre of the novella as an expression of social and political contexts within and across cultures from its inception in feudal times to the post-modern age.
